title: Double entry of paap & punya: How ancient India shaped the logic of modern bookkeeping
description: Ancient Indian temples, guilds and merchants practised balanced accounting centuries before Europe. From bahi khata to Jain manuals, Indias paap–punya philosophy shaped the logic behind double-entry bookkeeping.

title: Dagestan’s Hidden Experiences: Cliff Roads, Ancient Water Channels, Tea Houses, and Life Beyond the Map
description: Dagestan’s Hidden Experiences: Cliff Roads, Ancient Water Channels, Tea Houses, and Life Beyond the MapDiscover hidden experiences of Dagestan, from cliffside roads and ancient irrigation to tea houses, snowbound villages, and unmarked viewpoints.The post Dagestan’s Hidden Experiences: Cliff Roads, Ancient Water Channels, Tea Houses, and Life Beyond the Map appeared first on Travel And Tour World.

title: Masks of the ancient Phoenician inhabitants of Malaga's El Cerro del Villar site revealed
Ancient African bedrock reveals the violent beginnings of life on our blue planet
description: You have probably seen the images of the surface of Mars, beamed back by NASA's rovers. What if there were a time machine capable of roaming Earth during its remote geological past, perhaps even going right back to its beginnings, beaming back pictures of similar quality?

title: What were books like in ancient Greece and Rome?
description: If you were to visit a bookshop in the ancient world, what would it be like?
